=File Format=

This document details the simplate file format. See also:

  # [Installation details on wiring simplates up to Django]
  # [http://code.google.com/p/simplates/ the tutorial]

Start with these old docs:

http://www.zetadev.com/software/aspen/trunk/doc/html/api-handlers-simplates.html

=== Tips ===

Here is how to map `Ctrl-B` in VIM to spit out the simplate break token:

{{{
imap <C-b> #<!--===BREAK===--><Enter>
}}}
